title: Legal Research Aide
keywords: Native American Graves Protection and Repatriation Act (NAGPRA)
duties_responsibilities: Conduct legal research under the direction of Professor Reed for scholarly a project creating a model Intellectual Property Code for Native American Tribes.
Continuing research into the Native American Graves Protection and Repatriation Act (NAGPRA)
Facilitate communication and conference planning with Native American tribes, scholars, and ASU partners participating in the NAGPRA:30 Years and Beyond event.
Assist with other duties as assigned.
required_qualifications: Ability to conduct research using major legal databases (Westlaw, Lexis) is required.
preferred_qualifications: Knowledge of intellectual property law or federal Indian law is helpful.
